thread.title: dawn goar
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by dawn goar

author: dawn goar
title: dawn goar
text:
Shane was my rock as I was nervous about turning 50th and where to go for my Birthday. He assured me that not only am I fabulous at 50 but everything I asked for he could find. He wasn't a "stuff shirt" and he truly listened to my needs. I have to say that I will not only choose your organization for all of my future travel plans, but I will do so with Shane Benson as my guide. As I have shouted to him many times;SHANE BENSON YOU ROCK!!!!
Dawn Goar
